title: Argalus and Parthenia The argument of ye history. Written by Fra: Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Marriott in St. Dunstons Church:yard fleetstreet,
notes: The title page is engraved and signed: Tho: Cecill sculp.
Based on a story in Sir Philip Sidney's "Arcadia".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
